Pre-Game Insights: The Houston Astros will face the Seattle Mariners at Minute Maid Park on Tuesday, September 24, 2024, at 10:10 AM AEST.
Hunter Brown (11-8, 3.57 ERA) will start for the Astros, while Bryce Miller (11-8, 3.06 ERA) will counter for the Mariners.
The article provides betting odds and predictions, with the Astros favored at -1.5 runs with odds of $2.54 and the Mariners as underdogs at +1.5 runs with odds of $1.50.
The over/under for total runs scored is set at 7.5, with odds of $1.91 for both over and under.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match-up is scheduled at Minute Maid Park.
